name: Carolyn F. SARGENT, Appellant, v. J.C. PENNEY AUTO INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellee

docket_number: Appeal No. 131 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1986

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: Carolyn F. SARGENT, Appellant, v. J.C. PENNEY AUTO INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John P. Yatsko, Norristown, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
526 A.2d 348
Carolyn F. SARGENT, Appellant, v. J.C. PENNEY AUTO INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 7, 1987.
Decided May 28, 1987.
John P. Yatsko, Norristown, for appellant.
James J. Oliver, Joseph A. Whip, Jr., Norristown, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
